content: And so regarding our dividend program, during the past quarter, we paid out $10.8 million in dividends and I want to announce that our Board of Directors approved our 31st consecutive dividends which will be paid in the month of February at a rate of $0.20 per share, which is an 18% increase over last year. You may proceed with your question. You may proceed with your question. You may proceed with your question. You may proceed with your question. You may proceed with your question.
